title: eeshan kanaka sabhEshan
sahitya:
Ishan kanaka sabhEshan tillai vAsan tiru naTarAjan padam tuNaiyE kumarEshanin
ishaittamizh tara

anupallavi
 
tEjOmaya cinmaya cidvilAsan shilinudal umayavaL prANEshan shIraDiyArgaL
nEshan

caraNam
 
anbilAda nIcanAm enaiyum vandANDu koNDaruLum sarvEshan inba sAgara kavi
kunjaradAsan enadaga irukalavEva rUpAnukOTi ena oLi vIshu prakAshan nal
